title: What’s in Israel’s Deal With Bahrain and the U.A.E.?
sub_head: Pact marks third time Israel has reached diplomatic agreement with regional neighbors
body:
TEL AVIV—A diplomatic deal signed in September normalizes relations between Israel and Gulf states Bahrain and the United Arab Emirates, further isolating Iran and the Palestinians. President Trump, who presided over the signing of the agreement at the White House, described it as historic.
Here is a look at what the pact involves and what it means for the Middle East.
Israel...
